Name: HEXONEX
About the game: HEXONEX is a casual hex-based puzzle game. Slide tiles to match colors across 108 puzzles. But think carefully before you act! Tiles can only move opposite any adjacent tiles, and you lose a point for every move you make! Beat your high scores to unlock new tile palettes, board palettes, and music, and mix and match to customize your experience!
